longBusinessSummary: JSW Infrastructure Limited, an infrastructure development company, operates commercial ports in India and internationally. The company's activities include developing, operating, and maintaining port services; ports related infrastructure development activities; and developing infrastructure projects. It also provides maritime related services, including cargo handling, storage, logistics, and other value-added services. In addition, the company operates and manages ports and port terminals. The company was formerly known as JSW Infrastructure & Logistics Limited and changed its name to JSW Infrastructure Limited on March 25, 2008. JSW Infrastructure Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Mumbai, India. JSW Infrastructure Limited is a subsidiary of Sajjan Jindal Family Trust.
